mapper.select: select a.no, a.title , a.member_no as memberNo, b.name as memberName, a.view_cnt as viewCount, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:MM:ss') as Regdate from board a, member b where a.member_no = b.no order by a.reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into board values ( board_no_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberNo}, 0, SYSDATE )
